author: IGN
description: Check out the Update 2.0 Launch Trailer for The Riftbreaker, a co-op base-building survival action RPG developed by Exor Studios. Players can now gain access to the new Update 2.0, bringing an expansion to the original Story Campaign, gameplay improvements, quality of life changes, performance optimizations, and more for newcomers and longtime fans alike. Update 2.0 for The Riftbreaker is available now for PC (Steam).
title: The Riftbreaker - Official Update 2.0 Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description: Leana Hafer revisited Valheim on PC for this update, covering how it's changed since she first reviewed it in 2021. It's also available on Xbox Series X/S.
title: Valheim Review Update - Call to Arms and What's Changed Between 2021 & 2025

author: IGN
description:
Get another look at Warborne Above Ashes in this latest trailer for this upcoming free-to-fight, 24/7 real-time PVP MMO. Warborne Above Ashes will be available on PC September 19, 2025. 

In Warborne Above Ashes, become a Drifter Mer to ride behemoths, command war machines, and rally your warbands. Dive into massive, ever-shifting battlefields with thousands of players online and experience truly rule-free warfare. Boundless, Relentless, Fearless!

#ign #gaming
title: Warborne Above Ashes - Official Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
The Nintendo Switch 2 has sold around two million units from its launch at the beginning of June through the end of July. Two million consoles sold in two months outpaces the orginal Switch's sales during the same two-month launch period back in 2017, by about 75%. The Switch 2 Pro Controller is also the best-selling accessory of the year so far. In other news, Amazon has reportedly set a date for the beginning of filming for its Mass Effect series: Q4 2026. Story details make it seem like the show will adapt at least the first game, so fans can probably expect a straightforward adaptation (unlike what the Halo live-action series got). And finally, Gears of War: Reloaded is having a rough launch on Steam, with many players reporting crashes, and some pre-order bonuses missing.
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Sells 2 Million in 2 Months, Outpacing Switch 1 - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Alien: Earth hits the mid-point this week and dropped potentially divisive plot point. In the episode, appropriately titled "Observation," everybody is taking stock and checking in to see how they're doing after the sudden and traumatic adventure through the Maginot crash. So it's only fitting that, after episode 4 and the latest addition to the Alien franchise's mythology, we do the same. So we looked at 5 plot points from "Observation" to ask the question, is it time to bail? Or should you stick around?

#IGN
title: Alien: Earth - After Ep. 4's Big Revelation, Is It Time to Bail?

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Release Date Trailer for Solo Leveling: Arise Overdrive, an action online RPG developed by Netmarble Neo. Players will level up as Sung Jinwoo from battle to battle, growing ever stronger making use of strategic combat mechanics, and deep progression systems. Go into the fray alone or with friends, with four-player co-op in Solo Leveling: Arise Overdrive, launching on November 17 for PC (Steam and Xbox PC) with a release on PlayStation 5 (PS5) and Xbox Series X|S in 2026.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Solo Leveling: Arise Overdrive - Official Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Gamescom 2025 Gameplay Demo Playthrough Video for Crosswind, an upcoming open-world naval-based survival crafting adventure game developed by Crosswind Crew. Players can take a look at over 19 minutes of raw gameplay of the latest build of Crosswind, packed with new work-in-progress features and revamped content. Take to the seas to gather resources, build structures, and engage with the soulslite melee-based combat alone or with friends in Crosswind, coming soon to PC (Steam).

description:
Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater is about to re-introduce us to one of stealth's greatest adventures, but is it on our list of the 10 best stealth games? From getaway heists all the way up to precision assassin sims, these are our favourite stealth missions.

description:

Players can get acquainted with the new City experience packed with a new REC look, Street Kings Mode, a new Park every season, and more for players to enjoy. description:
Check out the Early Access Development Update Overview for Skate, the upcoming free-to-play installment, and return to the skateboarding simulation game developed by Full Circle. Get the rundown on all of the changes coming to the Early Access release from the developers. The Early Access launch for Skate is packed with improved Flick-It controls, a plethora of tricks to master with more being added during the Early Access period, and more. Skate is launching into Early Access on September 16 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam, Epic Games Store, EA App).

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Kirby and the Forgotten Land – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition + Star-Crossed World launch trailer for this upcoming upgrade to the original platformer game. Join Kirby on a magical journey through the Forgotten Land with enhanced resolution and frame rates. Then, uncover the mystery of the meteor with a brand-new story. Kirby and the Forgotten Land – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition + Star-Crossed World will be available on Nintendo Switch 2 on August 28, 2025.

#KirbyAndTheForgottenLandStarCrossedWorld #Gaming #IGN

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the iOS Launch Trailer for Hitman: World of Assassination, a collection of the iconic Hitman trilogy developed by IO Interactive. Players can assume the role of Agent 47 across a suite of missions in over 25 different locations on the go with the mobile release. Take out high-value targets from global elites to celebrities alike using tactical espionage and a sandbox of different elements to take advantage of. Hitman: World of Assassination is available now for iOS alongside PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), PlayStation VR2 (PS VR2), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#HitmanWorldOfAssassination #Gaming #IGN
title: Hitman: World of Assassination - Official iOS Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In a reboot of the classic Roger Corman‘s cult sword and sorcery film series, Deathstalker stars Daniel Bernhardt (John Wick, The Matrix Reloaded) as the titular character in this reimagined installment, with Patton Oswalt (Young Adult, Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire) providing the voice of the benevolent wizard Doodad.

In Deathstalker, the Kingdom of Abraxeon is under siege by the Dreadites, heralds of the long-dead sorcerer Nekromemnon. When Deathstalker recovers a cursed amulet from a corpse-strewn battlefield, he's marked by dark magick and hunted by monstrous assassins. To survive, he must break the curse and face the rising evil. Death is just the beginning… of great adventure!

Directed by Steven Kostanski (The Void, PG: Psycho Goreman), Kostanski’s reboot focuses on the fantasy setting, utilizing creature suits, prosthetic FX make-up and stop-motion animation from his Action Pants FX shop. Slash and Rodrigo Gudino serve as executive producers under the BerserkerGang label.

Shou
title: Deathstalker - Exclusive Red Band Trailer (2025) Daniel Bernhardt, Patton Oswalt

author: IGN
description:
A story about the natural laws of the world is about to begin. Seek comrades willing to face destiny beside you. The time of the world's end draws near. Check out the latest Digimon Story Time Stranger trailer to learn more about the story of this upcoming turn-based RPG. Digimon Story Time Stranger will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X/S, and Steam on October 3, 2025.

#DigimonStoryTimeStranger #Gaming #IGN
title: Digimon Story Time Stranger - Official Story Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Prepare to ascend the spiralling steps into a lavish lighthouse. An opulent beacon of beauty? A mysterious, morbid monolith hiding a sinister secret? It's up to you to discover. Check out the unsettling P1: Anchor Light trailer for this upcoming anomaly-hunting horror game. P1: Anchor Light will be available on PC via Steam on September 9, on PlayStation on October 14, and on Xbox on November 11. 

P1: Anchor Light is the first game in an upcoming series that explores the Paradise universe. In P1: Anchor, enter an art-deco-inspired looping lighthouse where the aim of the game is to identify the ever-seeping anomalies in a bid to shut down the facility and finally bury its dark history. Begging to have its secrets uncovered, P1: Anchor Light plays on the sinister, where every whispering echo is a voice yearning to be heard. Can you silence the light before its madness consumes all?

#P1AnchorLight #Gaming #IGN
title: P1: Anchor Light - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Enjoy this nine-minute gameplay explainer for Guardians of the Sky, the upcoming creature-collecting co-op open-world survival-crafting adventure where magical creatures called Guardians are your greatest allies. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested ahead of its Early Access release later this year: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1579420/Guardians_of_the_Wild_Sky/

#IGN #Gaming
title: Guardians of the Wild Sky - Official Gameplay Explainer

author: IGN
description:
Join Nikki and Momo in welcoming a special guest from afar. Watch the Infinity Nikki × Stardew Valley trailer to see what's coming to Infinity Nikki with this collaboration between the action-adventure game and the farming sim. You can take part in an event-exclusive quest called New Friend Carried by Stars to claim the exclusive Chicken Gramophone furniture and the 3-star collab outfit, Stardew Valley Encounter. Additionally, if you unlock all existing tracks with the Chicken Gramophone, you will receive the collaboration-inspired accessory called A Blessing unto You.

#InfinityNikki #StardewValley #Gaming
title: Infinity Nikki × Stardew Valley - Official Collaboration Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Sisu: Road to Revenge is a wall-to-wall cinematic action event, a sequel to the original sleeper hit SISU. Returning to the house where his family was brutally murdered during the war, “the man who refuses to die” (Jorma Tommila) dismantles it, loads it on a truck, and is determined to rebuild it somewhere safe in their honor. 

When the Red Army commander who killed his family (Stephen Lang from Don’t Breathe) comes back hellbent on finishing the job, a relentless, eye-popping cross-country chase ensues - a fight to the death, full of clever, unbelievable action set pieces.

Written and directed by Jalmari Helander, Sisu: Road to Revenge will be released in theaters by Screen Gems on November 21, 2025.

#IGN #Movies
title: Sisu: Road to Revenge - Exclusive Red Band Trailer (2025) Jorma Tommila, Stephen Lang

author: IGN
description:
Watch the latest No Man's Sky trailer to see what to expect with the Voyagers 6.0 update for the action-adventure survival game. In No Man's Sky: Voyagers, create your own colossal, fully furnished, completely bespoke Corvette-class starship and invite your friends on board. The update also introduces habitable, multi-crew starships assembled from hundreds of ship modules, new multiplayer missions, a detailed new player suit, a ship-building community expedition, and more. No Man's Sky: Voyagers 6.0 update is available today, August 27, 2025.

#NoMansSkyVoyagers #Gaming #IGN
title: No Man's Sky: Voyagers - Official Update 6.0 Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Super NES Nintendo Classics Features Update Trailer for Nintendo Switch and Nintendo Switch 2, the hit Nintendo handheld game systems developed by Nintendo. Players can make use of new features for the Super NES Nintendo Classics catalog, such as Mouse Controls compatibility for the Joy-Con 2 on Nintendo Switch 2 and USB mice on both Nintendo Switch systems. Customizable Controls is also available with the update, allowing players to remap button controls on a system level for all Super NES Nintendo Classics games or a control scheme for each game. The Super NES Nintendo Classics Features Update is available now for Nintendo Switch and Nintendo Switch 2 with a Nintendo Switch Online subscription.

#NintendoSwitchOnline #Gaming #IGN
title: Nintendo Switch 2 - Official Super NES Nintendo Classics Features Update Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Roxie Richter and Lucas Lee Character Reveal Trailer for Scott Pilgrim EX, a 2D action-adventure brawling game developed by Tribute Games. Players can get their first look at fan-favorites Roxie Richter and Lucas Lee as they join the fray of intense action. Lucas Lee takes out enemies with quick and brutal succession with his signature skateboard, while Roxie Richter makes swift use of her katana to dispatch adversaries with a boba drink in hand. Fight as Roxie Richter and Lucas Lee in Scott Pilgrim EX, coming to PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam) in 2026.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Scott Pilgrim EX - Official Roxie Richter and Lucas Lee Character Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
After a heist, four criminals lay low in a remote safe house, waiting for orders. As paranoia builds, one thing becomes clear—the real threat may not be outside, but among them.

The taut psychological thriller stars BAFTA-nominated veteran Eddie Marsan (Ray Donovan), fan-favorite Sam Claflin (Peaky Blinders), genre standout Burn Gorman (Game of Thrones), breakout talent Tienne Simon, with rising star Suki Waterhouse (Daisy Jones & The Six) and award-winning Rory Kinnear (James Bond franchise). 

Directed by Barnaby Roper and written by John Patrick Dover, the film will be released in select theatres and on digital in the United States, on digital in the UK on September 26, in Germany on September 25, and in Australia on October 1.
title: All The Devils Are Here - Exclusive Trailer (2025) Eddie Marsan, Sam Claflin, Suki Waterhouse

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Gameplay Trailer for The Last Caretaker, a first-person survival-crafting shooter developed by Channel37. Players will assume the role of a reawakened machine, the last of the caretakers, to save the human race by making the journey to deliver embryos from a desolate Earth to the remaining human settlements in space. Recycle materials, explore man-made laboratories to harbors, and manage crafting materials on this grand adventure that reveals what it truly means to be human. The Last Caretaker is coming soon to PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #Gaming
title: The Last Caretaker - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Kirby and the Forgotten Land - Nintendo Switch 2 Edition+ Star-Crossed World reviewed by Tom Marks on Nintendo Switch 2.

Kirby and the Forgotten Land is still a great platformer three years later, and the Star-Crossed World DLC that comes as part of its Nintendo Switch 2 Edition adds a few more amusing levels to the mix – but that’s about it. A couple of cool new enemies, funny Mouthful Mode transformations, and clever ideas put its 12 stages in the top half of the heap overall, but with little beyond that, this comes across less like a proper expansion and more like a DLC level pack to invite you to come back for a weekend. It’s all fun enough that it’s fairly easy to recommend to anyone who has been dying for more Forgotten Land since finishing it, but doesn’t feel like an upgrade that will irresistibly suck you in like one of Kirby’s mouthfuls.

#IGN #Gaming #Nintendo
title: Kirby and the Forgotten Land + Star-Crossed World Review

author: IGN
description:
Ever wanted to make your own music videos in a rhythm action game? Well now you can with Dead As Disco gameplay, a vibrant fighting game that mixes the combat from the Arkham series with the rhythmic action of Hi-Fi Rush. In this interview from gamescom 2025, James Karras from Brain Jar Games talks story, combat and the most exciting upcoming feature for budding producers; the option to be able to edit your very own music videos using custom tracks that you've uploaded yourself.

#gamescom2025
title: Dead As Disco - Arkham's Combat Meets Hi-Fi Rush | gamescom 2025
